channel.title: Duping
channel.description:
hi i know that a number of servers have anti dupe. i was wondering how to put it on. can anyone tell me a short tut on to add anti-dupe?
thanks

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

Add this in client.java under case 145. It will fix trading & banking & report to a moderator, admin or owner when they try and trade the duped item.

if(interfaceID == 7423) { bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1);openUpDepBox(); } else if (interfaceID == 5064) { // remove from bag to bank bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 5382) { // remove from bank fromBank(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 3322) { if ((removeID == (playerItems[removeSlot] -1)) && (removeID > 0)){ // Trade Dupe fix by Gdog284 (www.Gdogscape.webs.com) tradeItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else { modYell("[REPORT] " + playerName + " & client-" + trade_other + " tried to Trade dupe " + getItemName(removeID) + "."); }

Read full topic

item.description:

Just add required checks… Like if the open interface is teh trade interface, if the player declined, stuff like that

item.title: Duping
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“the hunt, post:1, topic:291044”][quote author=humza-ali link=topic=384767.msg2886138#msg2886138 date=1248624990]
hi i know that a number of servers have anti dupe. i was wondering how to put it on.
can anyone tell me a short tut on to add anti-dupe?

thanks
[/quote]

Add a timer for trading.[/quote]

you don’t even need one if the trade system is programmed correctly

Read full topic
